definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: I struggled for a few days trying to come up with a good color palette for Overwatch .
sentences.chinese: 我努力的试图找出一个看守好调色板了几天。

sentences.english: The palette displays a set of tools for creating objects in the diagram.
sentences.chinese: 该调色板显示了一组工具，用于在图中创建对象。

sentences.english: The tray in the centre will hold the HARMAN SELENIUM TONER.
sentences.chinese: 放在中间的显影盘倒入伊尔福硒调色液。

sentences.english: In this room you can also find Aleksandr’s easel and palettes.
sentences.chinese: 在这个房间你也可以发现亚历山大的画架和调色板。

sentences.english: Artists using this method of mixing colours to draw are called " pointillism".
sentences.chinese: 美术家用这个调色法作画，称为“点描派”。

sentences.english: 16-bit file support and palettes were added to this version as well.
sentences.chinese: 这一版本还加入了16位图支持和调色板。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a toner fixing belt.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种调色剂定影带。

sentences.english: Please note that high-light color and skin colors.
sentences.chinese: 高光调色请留神跟肤色的拆配。

sentences.english: It’s a bit like having a palette of colors to dip your paintbrush in.
sentences.chinese: 这就像用画笔蘸着调色板里的颜料一样。

sentences.english: Toner, preparation method thereof, developer and image forming method.
sentences.chinese: 调色剂，其制备方法，显影剂以及图像形成方法。

sentences.english: Various dry, muddy smears on the palette confirmed this statement.
sentences.chinese: 调色板上乱七八糟的污痕证实了这句话。

sentences.english: Use a palette with deep wells for mixing colour, with lots of water.
sentences.chinese: 使用带有混合调色板颜色深水井与大量的水。

sentences.english: Zip- Position chart and palette source code zip, Visual.
Here you can build a palette of custom colors.
sentences.chinese: 在此您可以自己建立调色盘。

sentences.english: A painter tempers his colours by mixing them with oil.
sentences.chinese: 画家把颜料混进油里来调色。

sentences.english: Keep the object selected and open the Pathfinder Palette.
sentences.chinese: 保持对象的选定，并打开探路者的调色盘。

definition: to color (a picture etc)/to dye (fabric etc)/to stain (furniture etc)
contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
to make a draft/to draft (a document)
